episodes.overview: Jethro challengers next door to the war of the roses, Colonel Dumbarton accepts & they commence to joust.   Jed wants to go to see the Queen & give her the deed to Canada.   Mr Drysdale convinces him to stay & says he'll bring the Queen to Him.   Mr Drysdale dresses Miss Jane as Queen Elizabeth the 1st & accepts the deed. Jethro is Knighted as well.

episodes.name: Coming Through the Rye
episodes.overview: Jethro spies Col.Dumbarton's neice through his telescope.When he tells Jed to look through it Jed sees her brother & thinks it's her 'cause he (she) is wearing a dress.(scottish kilt)   Jethro is in love,he wants to marry her.   Granny doesn't want Jethro to marry a big ugly girl like that & eventually gets her wish.

episodes.name: Ghost of Clampett Castle
episodes.overview: Mr Drysdale wants to go home,but the Clampetts aren't ready to go yet. Faversham tells him about the Ghost of Clampett castle. Mr Drysdale thinks this will scare the Clampetts & they'll want to go home.   Mr Drysdale tells them the story & Jethro wants to hold a seance to contact the ghost.    Mr Drysdale dresses as a ghost & almost has them packing their bags until Granny shoots the 'ghost'with her shotgun & he goes howling down the hall.   On the trip home Mr Drysdale has to stand all the way 'cause he can't sit down.!

episodes.name: Granny Goes to Hooterville
episodes.overview: Petticoat Junction citizens take Granny's potent potions.

episodes.name: The Italian Cook
episodes.overview:
While Granny's still in Hooterville, Jethro hires an Italian chef to do their cooking.

Granny's @ Drucker's telling him about how she used her tonic on Steve & Betty Jo's baby after discovering that Boy (the Petticoat Junction dog) was in the baby crib, wearing a baby bonnet as well.  Thinking that her tonic turned the dog into their baby.

Granny sees the baby for the first time & thought it worked wonders!

Sam Drucker arrives @ the Shady Rest with a telegram for Granny.  The message was from Jethro saying the family's starving & misses her.  So after riding on a horse, driving a motorcycle, getting on an airplane, parachuting down to Beverly Hills, she finds the Italian cook feeding the Clampetts.  Granny chases after Jethro over that phony telegram!

episodes.name: The Great Cook-Off
episodes.overview: A temporary but tempting Italian cook stirs up a storm.

episodes.name: Bonnie, Flatt, and Scruggs
episodes.overview: Musicians Lester Flatt and Earl Scruggs play themselves in a spoof of Bonnie and Clyde

episodes.name: The Thanksgiving Spirit
episodes.overview: Thanksgiving with the folks from Petticoat Junction and Green Acres.

episodes.name: The Courtship of Homer Noodleman
episodes.overview: Drysdale casts Dash Riprock in a new role, that of Elly May's lover.

episodes.name: The Hot-Rod Truck
episodes.overview: Jethro wants to junk his ""old wreck,"" and Granny thinks he means her.

episodes.name: The Week Before Christmas
episodes.overview: The hustle and bustle increases as Christmas nears.

episodes.name: Christmas in Hooterville
episodes.overview: The hillbillies celebrate the Christmas holidays in Hooterville.

episodes.name: Drysdale and Friend
episodes.overview: Drysdale finds himself jailed and sharing a cell with a bear.

episodes.name: Problem Bear
episodes.overview: Drysdale has the flu, and too many well-meaning visitors.

episodes.name: Jethro the Flesh Peddler
episodes.overview:
Jethro starts his own Hollywood talent agengy called JB Enterprises.  His office, the entire 5th floor of The Commerce Bank of Beverly Hills.

Meanwhile, Cousin Roy pays a visit when a record agent heard him play back in his hometown.  The gang decides to pay a visit to JB, hoping he would sign Roy.  Jethro doesn't want any hayseeds as clients.

So Roy decided to pack for home until he saw Elly May in a nice dress.  Roy was speechless (seeing Elly in a nice dress), he decides to pay a visit to that record company.

episodes.name: Cousin Roy in Movieland
episodes.overview:
Roy arrives @ the Clampett house hoping to make it in show biz.  Problem is, he doesn't have the money.  So Jed decides to back up Roy.

Meanwhile, Jethro faces eviction from his office @ the Commerce Bank of Beverly Hills.  Mr. Drysdale demands the $5,000 rent.

Jed tries to have Jethro become Roy's agent, but Jethro doesn't want any country hick acts.  So he changes Roy to being part of a group.

When Roy's new act bombs, Jed & Mr. Drysdale advise Jethro to stick with country music after Roy's record becomes a hit!  But Jethro tore the contract & starts begging for Roy to come back!

episodes.name: Jed Clampett Enterprises
episodes.overview: Drysdale evicts Jethro from the bank building.

episodes.name: The Phantom Fifth Floor
episodes.overview: Chaos is rampant at Clampett Enterprises.

episodes.name: The Hired Gun
episodes.overview: Drysdale schemes to evict the Clampetts.

episodes.name: The Happy Bank
episodes.overview: Business is booming â€” if confusing â€” at Clampett Enterprises.

episodes.name: Sam Drucker's Visit
episodes.overview: Sam Drucker (Frank Cady) foments family unrest when he visits the hillbillies.

episodes.name: The Guru
episodes.overview: The mansion becomes a mecca for a phony guru (William Mims).

episodes.name: The Jogging Clampetts
episodes.overview: Jogging mania seizes the hillbillies and Drysdale.

episodes.name: Collard Greens an' Fatback
episodes.overview: Pat Boone as a prospective buyer of the Drysdale home.

episodes.name: Back to the Hills
episodes.overview: The Clampetts head for the hills to snare a man for Elly May.

episodes.name: The Hills of Home
episodes.overview: Partly filmed in the Ozarks: the Clampetts' hectic homecoming.

episodes.name: Silver Dollar City Fair
episodes.overview: Granny is trying to snare a spouse for Elly May.

episodes.name: Jane Finds Elly a Man
episodes.overview: Jane and Jethro become involved in the search for Elly's groom-to-be.

episodes.name: Wedding Plans
episodes.overview: The Clampetts plan Elly's wedding to Matthew Templeton (Roger Torrey).

episodes.name: Jed Buys Central Park
episodes.overview: Con man Shifty Shafer (Phil Silvers) meets Jed in the Ozarks.

episodes.name: The Clampetts in New York
episodes.overview: Phil Silvers as con man Shifty Shafer. Partly filmed in New York.

episodes.name: Manhattan Hillbillies
episodes.overview: Sammy Davis Jr. has a cameo on the hillbillies' New York jaunt.

episodes.name: Home Again
episodes.overview: Granny complicates things for Elly and her beau (Brian West).

episodes.name: Shorty Kellems Moves West
episodes.overview: Shorty (Shug Fisher) goes West for a fling at the wild life.

episodes.name: Midnight Shorty
episodes.overview: A rumor that Shorty is a millionaire lands him loads of dates.

episodes.name: Shorty Go Home
episodes.overview: Granny wants to send Shorty packing.

episodes.name: The Hero
episodes.overview: Soupy Sales plays the Drysdales' air-ace nephew.

episodes.name: Our Hero the Banker
episodes.overview: Air Force ace Jetstream Bradford joins his Uncle Drysdale's bank.

episodes.name: Buzz Bodine, Boy General
episodes.overview: Jethro arrives in Hooterville wearing the uniform of a general.

episodes.name: The Clampett-Hewes Empire
episodes.overview: Rumor has it that the Clampetts plan to merge their interests with a tycoon (Guy Raymond).

episodes.name: What Happened to Shorty?
episodes.overview: Silver Dollar City's mayor is fixin' to send Shorty back to the hills.

episodes.name: Marry Me, Shorty
episodes.overview: The marriage battle between Shorty and Elverna (Elvia Allman) rages on.

episodes.name: Shorty Spits the Hook
episodes.overview: Shorty balks at marrying Elverna.

episodes.name: Three-Day Reprieve
episodes.overview: Shorty must behave for three days before he can marry Elverna.

episodes.name: The Wedding
episodes.overview: Shorty finally gets married, but it's to the wrong woman.

episodes.name: Annul That Marriage
episodes.overview: Shorty and Elverna engage in marital mayhem.

episodes.name: Hotel For Women
episodes.overview: When Granny induces Jed, Elly, and Jethro to move into the nostalgic old cabin, Shorty Kellems exploits the now-unoccupied mansion.

episodes.name: Simon Legree Drysdale
episodes.overview: Slave driver Drysdale meets his secretary's burly brother.

episodes.name: Honest John Returns
episodes.overview: Con man Shifty Shafer (Phil Silvers) hooks Jed on a plan to rid Los Angeles of smog.

episodes.name: Honesty is the Best Policy
episodes.overview: Shifty Shafer and his wife scheme to defraud the Clampetts.

episodes.name: The Pollution Solution
episodes.overview: Jed plans to hand his millions over to the President.

episodes.name: The Clampetts in Washington
episodes.overview: A con man (Phil Silvers) tries to sell Washington, D.C., to Jed.

episodes.name: Jed Buys the Capitol
episodes.overview: Shifty Shafer cons Jed into buying the U.S. Capitol.

episodes.name: Mark Templeton Arrives
episodes.overview: One Granny plus one Navy frogman equals a running gag: Granny thinks Elly's new beau is a frog.

episodes.name: Don't Marry a Frogman
episodes.overview: Granny's trying to cure her frog fixation with a potent elixir.

episodes.name: Doctor, Cure My Frog
episodes.overview: Granny believes that Elly's beau is a web-footed freak.

episodes.name: Do You Elly Take This Frog?
episodes.overview: A dream sends Granny to a psychiatrist (Richard Deacon).

episodes.name: The Frog Family
episodes.overview: Granny's afraid her family will turn into frogs.

episodes.name: Farm in the Ocean
episodes.overview: Drysdale tries to stop Elly's marriage.

episodes.name: Shorty to the Rescue
episodes.overview: Escalation of Granny's frog fixation: she's sending for reinforcements to help fight the frog.

episodes.name: Welcome to the Family
episodes.overview: Can Elly find happiness married to a frog? Granny's still fighting the match.

episodes.name: The Great Revelation
episodes.overview: Granny's frog phobia fades away.

episodes.name: The Grunion Invasion
episodes.overview: When The Clampetts learn that the grunion are due on the California coast, and having no idea who or what the grunion are, head down to the beach to defend it from invasion.

episodes.name: The Girls from Grun
episodes.overview: A task force of Clampetts awaits an invasion of the U.S. by fish.

episodes.name: The Grun Incident
episodes.overview: Women's lib protests hit Drysdale's bank.

episodes.name: Women's Lib
episodes.overview: Granny and Elly launch a fem lib protest.

episodes.name: The Teahouse of Jed Clampett
episodes.overview: How to thwart a women's lib strike: hire geisha girls.

episodes.name: The Palace of Clampett San
episodes.overview: Granny and Elly seek happiness as liberated women.

episodes.name: Lib and Let Lib
episodes.overview: The women's movement strikes at the bank.

episodes.name: Elly, the Working Girl
episodes.overview: Elly joins the women's lib battle against Drysdale.

episodes.name: Elly, the Secretary
episodes.overview: Jethro's bachelorhood seems headed for extinction.

episodes.name: Love Finds Jane Hathaway
episodes.overview: An unemployed actor is making a big play for Jane.

episodes.name: The Clampetts Meet Robert Audubon Getty Crockett
episodes.overview: An actor plans to capture the Clampett millions by passing himself off as kin to Davy Crockett.

episodes.name: Jethro Returns
episodes.overview: Fortune hunter Dick Bremerkamp schemes to marry Elly May.
